themes: opposition to public funding for large cultural venues
perception of inequity in funding allocation
critique of support for elite cultural forms (opera)
call for private funding from wealthy individuals/groups
key_phrases: Stop subsidizing establishments like the Long Center and Zach Scott
If the old money and techbros want opera, they can pay for it
barriers_identified: public funds directed toward elite institutions
solutions_proposed: Cease public subsidies for the Long Center and Zach Scott
Encourage private funding from wealthy individuals for elite cultural events
